title: Little Ghost Q-Taro
alternative_title: Obake no Q-Taro,Con ma Quitaro,Obake No Q-Tarō,Obake No Q-Tarou ,Q the Spook ,Q-taro,Q-Tarou, the Ghost ,オバケのＱ太郎,おばけのきゅうたろう ,怪物Q太郎
status: Obake no Q-Taro,Con ma Quitaro,Obake No Q-Tarō,Obake No Q-Tarou ,Q the Spook ,Q-taro,Q-Tarou, the Ghost ,オバケのＱ太郎,おばけのきゅうたろう ,怪物Q太郎
description:
Description :
        Little Ghost Q-Taro, by Fujiko Fujio, is a Japanese manga about a ghost, Q-Taro who lives with the Ohara family. Q-Taro, also known as Q-chan or Oba-Q, is a mischief-maker who likes to fly around scaring people and stealing food, though he is deathly afraid of dogs.

The story is usually focused on the antics of Q-Taro and his friends. The manga was drawn in 1964–1966 by Fujiko Fujio (Fujiko F. Fujio and Fujiko Fujio A) and in 1971–1974 by only Fujiko F. Fujio. An English manga volume was published in Japan as Q the Spook.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 2: Help Me Out With Everything!!
